column4: any reccomendations on a firewall package? I have been using ubuntu for a while, and i know some things about networking, but I'm not exactly an expert, and I've never configured a firewall from scratch before
firestarter is a nice front end to iptables, one of the most secure firewalls around
you don't need it unless you run a listening service, though
and in many cases if you run a listening service you don't want to filter it
